import React, { useState } from "react"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; function AddUser() { const [data,setData]=useState({ name:"", email:"", age:"", mobile:"", work:"", address:"", description:"" }) function handleData(e){ const {name,value}=e.target; setData(preData=>{ return {...preData,[name]:value} }) } function submitData(e){ e.preventDefault() console.log(data) setData("") } return ( <>
Home
); } export default AddUser;
